pr_title: ST: Parse protocol version from kafka-versions.yaml

timeline.bodyText: What's the benefit of using singleton here, compared with just having all static methods?
timeline.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: I used singleton here to keep parsed kafka-versions file instead of loading it everytime when method is used.
replies.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: You could use a static { } block to do that.
replies.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: I see, let me rework it :)
replies.author: Frawless

timeline.message:
